title: Watch Face - Beautiful Design

description: Beautiful Design is a new customizable watch face by YSAR design. Its stylish and elegant design will not be unnoticed.Watch faces by YSAR Design are compatible with both round and square android wear smartwatches: Moto 360, Asus ZenWatch, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, LG Watch Urbane, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 etc..Custom features:- Application for customization - Time, seconds- Battery indicator- Date- 2nd time zone watch- Ambient mode- Advanced and luxury design with superb readability, elegant and modern style, for men and womenFunctions:- Choose the color of digits and arrows- Choose between analog and digital versions of battery indicator, date and second time-zone watch- Turn on/off the indicatorsOur application is available right after you download the watch face from store and is simple in being set up. YSAR watch faces do not require much electric energy, so your smartwatch will operate for almost the same period of time as usual.Check out our watch faces with different features and designs: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=YSAR+Design.We have analog and digital watch faces, watch faces with skulls and slumber mode. We are trying to match any taste by introducing different watches of all styles.Please, rate, share and write comments, because we want to improve our watch faces and satisfy your needs.
descriptionHTML:
Beautiful Design is a new customizable watch face by YSAR design. Its stylish and elegant design will not be unnoticed.

Watch faces by YSAR Design are compatible with both round and square android wear smartwatches: Moto 360, Asus ZenWatch, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, LG Watch Urbane, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 etc..

Custom features:
- Application for customization
- Time, seconds
- Battery indicator
- Date
- 2nd time zone watch
- Ambient mode
- Advanced and luxury design with superb readability, elegant and modern style, for men and women

Functions:
- Choose the color of digits and arrows
- Choose between analog and digital versions of battery indicator, date and second time-zone watch
- Turn on/off the indicators

Our application is available right after you download the watch face from store and is simple in being set up. YSAR watch faces do not require much electric energy, so your smartwatch will operate for almost the same period of time as usual.

Check out our watch faces with different features and designs: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=YSAR+Design.
We have analog and digital watch faces, watch faces with skulls and slumber mode. We are trying to match any taste by introducing different watches of all styles.

Please, rate, share and write comments, because we want to improve our watch faces and satisfy your needs.
comments: I like the look of the face alot. The one problem I see is that there is no way to change the time before the watchface goes to ambient mode.  If there is a way please tell me.
Smart watch No clock options are not worth the price
Super. Very beautiful and stylish. Love the options
